text:

creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com

text:
The following preprocessor definitions are not defined:
  HAVE_NSS_NSS_H
  HAVE_NSS_H
  HAVE_NSS_PK11PUB_H
  HAVE_PK11PUB_H

Addition of the following line fixes compilation:
#include "apu_config.h"
creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com

text: This bug has been fixed in r1129341 (1.5.x branch) and r1129342 (1.4.x branch).
creator: Arfrever.FTA@GMail.Com
